nodes.text: The Chagri system in the Inner Rim contained a star that was orbited by several planets, including Champala. The star underwent a period of instability early in the evolutionary history of Champala, and as a result the Chagrian species that evolved on Champala possessed a natural resistance to radiation.

Champala's star was first mentioned in the 2001 sourcebook Alien Anthology, and it has received mentions in a number of subsequent sourcebooks and in the Codex of the BioWare video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, though the star's name has never been specified.
